title: Font Agent Pro Workgroup Edition
content:
Wondering if anyone here has any experience with this program? If it works well it seems like a good solution for my situation and I would love to hear some feedback about it.  
Had it with Suitcase and Font ExplorerX while very cool, isn’t quite what I’m looking for.

thanks  
peace

 [‹ Adding custom Unicode values to FLS5's list...](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235303/http:/typophile.com/node/18663 "Go to previous forum topic") [unicase ??? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235303/http:/typophile.com/node/17582 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Paul Cutler
